resources.string: I am a dedicated Android developer with a passion for creating exceptional mobile applications. With expertise in Android development, I strive to deliver innovative solutions that provide seamless user experiences.

This application includes videos from the YouTube channel NIE (New Indian Era). All videos are accessed through web views that link directly to the YouTube platform, ensuring that all views, ad impressions, and interactions benefit the original content creators.

Please note the following:

1. Non-Commercial Use: This application has been developed solely for a college project and does not aim to generate any profit or financial benefit.

2. Content Ownership: All video content is the property of NIE (New Indian Era). We do not claim ownership of any videos, and all rights remain with the original content creators.

3. Direct Access: By using web views, we ensure that the original content remains hosted on YouTube, and users interact directly with the YouTube platform.

4. Educational Purpose: The use of these videos is intended for educational purposes only, in the context of our college project.

If you have any concerns or issues regarding the use of your content, please contact us, and we will address your concerns promptly.

Thank you,
[Swapnil Jagannath Patil]
